import sys
def gcd(n,m):
    if n%m==0:
        return m
    return gcd(m,n%m)

def check(a,b,n):
    if n>a and n>b:
        return False
    if n%gcd(a,b)==0:
        return True
    return False

t=int(sys.stdin.readline())
while t!=0:
    a,b,n=map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    if check(a,b,n):
        sys.stdout.write("YES\n")
    else:
        sys.stdout.write("NO\n")
    t-=1
